ResourceHeader.Description: ACE Solar Wind Electron Proton Alpha Monitor (SWEPAM), Key Parameter, K1, Browse Data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate instrument teams about citing it. SWEPAM browse data is not validated by the experimenters and should not be used except for preliminary examination prior to detailed Studies. See: https://izw1.caltech.edu/ACE/.

PublicationInfo.Authors: McComas, D., Skoug, R., Delapp, D., Elliott, H., and Davis, A.

TimeSpan.Note: Data are current to within about 1 week

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Caveats: Average Type: standard This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Time PB5
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Time in PB5 Format: Year, Day, Milliseconds, Observation Time
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Proton Number Density
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: SWEPAM, Solar Wind Proton Number Density, Scalar, Preliminary Values, Browse use only
Parameter.Caveats: Np is the Proton Number Density in Units of cm^-3. It is obtained by Integration of the Ion, roughly the Proton, Distribution Function.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Proton Speed
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: SWEPAM, Solar Wind Bulk Speed, Preliminary Values, Browse use only
Parameter.Caveats: Vp is the Solar Wind Proton Speed, or more generally just the Solar Wind Bulk Speed. It is obtained by integrating the Ion, roughly the Proton, Distribution Function

Parameter.Name: He Ratio, He++ to H+
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: SWEPAM, Percentage of Helium++ Ions to Protons, He++/H+, Preliminary Values, Browse use only
Parameter.Caveats: He_ratio is the Ratio of the Number Density of Helium++ Ions to the Number Density of Protons

Parameter.Name: Proton Temperature, Radial Component
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: SWEPAM, Radial Component of the Proton Temperature, Preliminary Values, Browse use only
Parameter.Caveats: The Proton Temperature is the 1,1 Component of the Temperature Tensor, along the Radial Direction. It is obtained by Integration of the Ion, roughly the Proton, Distribution Function.

Parameter.Name: Number in Average
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: SWEPAM, Number of Measurements in Average
